text: There are 2 types of #antimalarials most often prescribed today for #lupus They also can be effective in mild forms of lupus where inflammation and blood clotting are a concern. They are #hydroxychloroquine (#Plaquenil) and #chloroquine (#Aralen), as per: https://t.co/ypUSEVSvK3 https://t.co/6QSAPUEuKX
